product_name: Overland Equipment Avery Shoulder Bag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With organizer pockets, a fleece-lined phone pocket and attractive bronze hardware, the Overland Avery is the perfect bag for a woman who wants to add a little style and elegance to her everyday bag. Adjustable leather shoulder strap with bronze hardware. Multi-pocket front organizer includes a fleece-lined mobile phone pocket and leather key ring; front flap closes with magnetic closure. Main compartment features a zipper closure with a leather zipper pull; internal zip security pocket. Closeout.
short_description: With organizer pockets, a fleece-lined phone pocket and attractive bronze hardware, the Overland Avery is the perfect bag for a woman who wants to add a little style and elegance to her everyday bag.
